verses.verse: <S%G5293>Let<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> be in subjection <S%G5293>to<s%> the <S%G5242>higher<s%> <S%G1849>authorities,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361>except<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G1849>those<s%> who <S%G5607>exist<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G5021>ordained<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> he who <S%G498>resists<s%> the <S%G1849>authority,<s%> <S%G436>withstands<s%> the <S%G1296>ordinance<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> those who <S%G436>withstand<s%> will <S%G2983>receive<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G2917>judgment.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G758>rulers<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G5401>terror<s%> <S%G2041>to<s%> the <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2041>to<s%> the <S%G2556>evil.<s%> Do <S%G2309>you<s%> desire to have <S%G3361>no<s%> fear <S%G5399>of<s%> the <S%G1849>authority?<s%> <S%G4160>Do<s%> that which is <S%G18>good,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> you will <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G846>same,<s%>

<S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G1249>servant<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G18>good.<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> that which is <S%G2556>evil,<s%> be <S%G5399>afraid,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G5409>bear<s%> the <S%G3162>sword<s%> in <S%G1500>vain;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G1249>servant<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> an <S%G1558>avenger<s%> for <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> him who <S%G4238>does<s%> <S%G2556>evil.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> you <S%G318>need<s%> to be in <S%G5293>subjection,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3709>wrath,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%>' sake.

<S%G1063><s%> <S%G1223>For<s%> this <S%G5124>reason<s%> <S%G5055>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> pay <S%G5411>taxes,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G3011>servants<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G4342>service,<s%> attending continually <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> very <S%G846>thing.<s%>

<S%G591>Give<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to <S%G3956>everyone<s%> what you <S%G3782>owe:<s%> <S%G5411>taxes<s%> to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5411>taxes<s%> are <S%G5056>due;<s%> customs to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5056>customs;<s%> <S%G5401>respect<s%> to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5401>respect;<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5092>honor.<s%>

<S%G3784>Owe<s%> no <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G1487>anything,<s%> <S%G3361>except<s%> to <S%G25>love<s%> one <S%G240>another;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he who <S%G25>loves<s%> his <S%G2087>neighbor<s%> has <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> the <S%G3551>law.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G3588>commandments,<s%> "You <S%G3431>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> commit <S%G3431>adultery,<s%>" "You <S%G5407>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5407>murder,<s%>" "You <S%G2813>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2813>steal,<s%>" "You <S%G5576>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> give false <S%G5576>testimony,<s%>" "You <S%G1937>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1937>covet,<s%>" <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1487><s%> <S%G5100>whatever<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G1785>commandments<s%> there <S%G346>are,<s%> are all summed up <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3056>saying,<s%> <S%G1722>namely,<s%> "You shall <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1438>yourself.<s%>"

<S%G2532>Do<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> the <S%G2540>time,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it is <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G5610>time<s%> for <S%G2248>you<s%> to <S%G1453>awaken<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5258>sleep,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2257><s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> is <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1452>nearer<s%> to us <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> we first <S%G4100>believed.<s%>

The <S%G3571>night<s%> is far <S%G1161>gone,<s%> and the <S%G2250>day<s%> is <S%G1448>near.<s%> <S%G659>Let<s%>'s <S%G3767>therefore<s%> throw <S%G659>off<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1746>let<s%>'s put on the <S%G3696>armor<s%> of <S%G5457>light.<s%>

Let us <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G5613>properly,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day;<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> in <S%G2970>reveling<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3178>drunkenness,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> in sexual <S%G2845>promiscuity<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G766>lustful<s%> <S%G3361>acts,<s%> and not in <S%G2054>strife<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2205>jealousy.<s%>
